website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling smoker box from a quality brand that's made from sturdy stainless steel that won't rust, discolor, or warp.
pros: A top-selling smoker box from a quality brand is made from sturdy stainless steel
Hinged lid makes it easy to lift the lid with tongs and replenish the wood chips when its hot
cons: Even thoroughly soaked wood chips sometimes burn quickly, not lasting long enough for foods that need longer smoking times

customer_reviews.title: Light smoke flavor, and it warped
customer_reviews.text: Hard to regulate the smoke output with this box, wood either ignites or doesn't produce sufficient smoke. If u manage to get it under control, expect only a light smokey flavor to the outside sear of the meat. The box warped after the second use so the lid does not close now. I would not recommend this to anyone that wants true smoked meat and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any gas-grill. Stainless steel construction.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have for any gas grill. Try putting the box on the grill (half-full with wood chips) for about 10-15 minutes during the grate-warming phase to get that smoke going! I choose not to soak my chips before I put them inside the box, but beware: non-soaked wood will combust into flames and must be monitored. I suggest keeping a water-spray bottle or hose ready to extinguish the flames if and when this happens during the cooking phase. I've also experimented with placing a single lump of quality charcoal inside this box in addition to my wood chips, and it also works really well for some added BBQ flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon USA Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: This little box smoked well, and seemed to work OK, until I had to open it to put in more chips. I found it had warped in the heat and I could not open it. When it cooled off, I tried to bend it back into shape, but it didn't work out as well as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Mini smoker thing for the BBQ grill
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is hot! Literally. It gets super hot and the smoking chips heat up inside and then smoke releases into the BBQ adding a slight hint of smoke to my meats. When you can't just up and leave with the Fam Bam to KC for real smoked meats, this bad boy comes through in the clutch. Added bonus, you can add all sorts of chips in it?!?!?!?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Swinney

customer_reviews.title: it works and is a good smoker box
customer_reviews.text: It works well with my natural gas grill (Weber Genesis II E310 Natural Gas). It was my first attempt at smoking with a gas grill, and at first, I did not realize how long it takes for smoke to come pouring out. But once it started smoking, it smokes! The only downside is that after 3 uses, the whole box morphed. it's not as easy to open and close the box anymore since the box is twisted with exposure to heat.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Thick steel
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Wood chips get a lot of flame even soaked in water, so you have to be prepared for it and be ready with a spray bottle. I use this box on Weber spirit 310 and it does not fit under the grate. I keep one grate on right hand side and just a box on the other side. Next time I will try using aluminum foil on the bottom of the box that may help fighting the flame. UPD: Cherry gets flame, hickory is good and I don't see flames. Enjoying using hickory, a lot of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Great smoky flavor, but excessive airflow may be a downside
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high quality accessory for your Weber Grill, but I found that if using small chips instead of chunks, it would get too much airflow and and burn up too fast. Also, after the first use, the finish became tarnished. Not a big deal, this was expected and works just fine. I think it's one of those things you need to understand the nuances to fully appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: KillerConch

customer_reviews.title: Trick to prevent the wood from catching fire
customer_reviews.text: This is a good smoke box that can be placed right on the grill top. The trick with preventing the wood chips from catching fire is to put aluminum foil on the bottom and sides of the box and then put your wood chips on top and close the box. This way, you cut off the oxygen from the bottom which can cause the smoking wood chips go catch fire. Also, your chips will smoke for a longer time!
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: Lid warped. First use. Otherwise, great box!
customer_reviews.text: This warped on my first use last Friday. I followed instructions for it and the wood chips and once all was done, the lid was warped. Very disappointed since this was brand name. It still works fine and it works GREAT, but if you're anal rentative and want the lid to fit squarely after one use, I don't recommend... The quality for the this price....
customer_reviews.author: Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials, comes with proper smoking directions!
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing it wrong all along. The smoker comes with directions for how to prep your smoking chips etc. If you want to become a pro at smoking, read the directions. The steel is top quality, as I'd expect from Weber. Please note that some of the metal edges can be a little sharp, so use caution when handling.
customer_reviews.author: Orweller Family

customer_reviews.title: Cheat made and poor concept
customer_reviews.text: It will definitely catch your wood chips on fire unless you soak them and keep the heat very low. This is for people who want to take their time cooking not being fast like a steak getting seared. The box is small and needs to be refilled a lot throughout the cook which defeats the purpose as you’re letting the heat out each time. I found another product that works much better without the slots on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Smokey goodness
customer_reviews.text: Love dialing in the temp on my weber genesis II and incorporating smoked flavor. Pro tip use dry chips first to ignite with lid open then add soaked chops and close lid... Awesome lol device.
customer_reviews.author: H.T.C

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: having trouble finding the right heat level to keep the wood chips smoking and not catching fire. keep a water bottle handy to stop any fire flare up. would like a video on how to find the right amount of heat to get it smoking and stay smoking without a fire in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart S Sacks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few of these. THIS is without a doubt the best I've ever had. Most would never get hot enough or didn't have enough ventilation or.. Weber, what can I say. I had a TON of smoke on my ribs this afternoon using this. Fantastic, great quality as well. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Smoke em if you got em.
customer_reviews.text: what can I say, this is one of the better "smokers" that I have seen and used. the biggest advantage to this one is that the hinged lid is able to be opened while on the grill with tongs, so that I can spoon in more wood chips. some of the other cheaper ones, the lid just sets on top, and it can wither get knocked off, or is difficult to pull off and add chips. I have used this several times since purchase and it is a great item to have in your outdoor cooking tools.
customer_reviews.author: Mike In San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Smoke box for gas grill
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, however it does warp under heat of the grill. Not the best for long smokes, the wood smokes too fast once at temp. It’s more for novelty and adding a little smoke for grilling burgers or chicken. Not for the serious smokers.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Glory

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: did some burgers on Weber genesis gas grill,during warmup(15 minutes)loaded with oak chips and had on the grate with lid closed,plenty of smoke through out the cook.the next day checked it and all that was left was fine ash
customer_reviews.author: Smileyface

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. I used it for the THIRD TIME TODAY and it is warped. The cover will not close now, so the wood chips catch fire.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok. Depends on what your expectations are.
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for it to get smoking. Had it sitting right on the gas burner guard. At one point it caught wood chips on fire. Don’t think it’s really a gas box. Webber could have designed it better to fit their grills
customer_reviews.author: Island soja

customer_reviews.title: This box has held up very well. The smoke ...
customer_reviews.text: This box has held up very well. The smoke is very heavy and doesn't last too long. I have two of them and alternate them for longer smoke times.
customer_reviews.author: HPE

customer_reviews.title: Used in Weber Genesis
customer_reviews.text: I used this to smoke pork and brisket in my Weber Genesis 2 and it was great. It is small so you do need to refill often for long cooks but was a great way to get that smokey flavor without an actual smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Griffin

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Good material and construction. We live at 7000 ft and are still experimenting with volume of chips, amount of time to soakthe chips, and time and temperature to achieve a 20 minute smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Renewedman

customer_reviews.title: Chips ahoy smokey!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I smoke everything now. I can not get the pellets to work well. But the wood chips work fantastic. Place it near the flame and let the smoke do the rest.
customer_reviews.author: RTC Medical

customer_reviews.title: Have a Quick Smoke
customer_reviews.text: Soaked wood ships burn very quickly. Once the chips ignite, there is intense smoke for 5-10 minutes then it's gone. The smoker box was set on top of the grates while cooking. There appears to be excessive air flow through the box. Perhaps some aluminum foil on the base would help with the problem but I shouldn't have to bother.
customer_reviews.author: Rillbilly

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This has completely transformed my gas grilling experience, I am so happy with this, it really ties together the gas grilling convenience and the results of a charcoal / wood fire. Even when I'm not using it, my gas grill smells wonderful simply because I do use it sometimes...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sims

customer_reviews.title: A BBQer's Delight
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smoker because it has so many holes and the wood chips burn quickly and completely. I have been waiting for a good wood chip smoker for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tom from Santa Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Option For Smoking
customer_reviews.text: I have a Weber Grill and had an expensive smoker. I barely used the smoker and it took up so much room. Wanted options to get a smoked flavor to our food. Came across this and it solved that problem. Simple to use, works great. Put wet woodchips in while you are grilling and you get that smokey taste.
customer_reviews.author: tridetroit

customer_reviews.title: It’ll get the job done
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use, but it got distorted and rusty after one use. Must not be stainless steel. Should have know by the feel of it alone.
customer_reviews.author: JessC

customer_reviews.title: Well used
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this smoke box on my weber grill about 10 times. It works well. I like how easy it is to scoop out ash while its still hot, and is dishwasher safe. Easy recommendation
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Won't really make your grill a smoker
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain to use. If you set it up as instructed you can't add chips easily. It doesn't hold enough for any lengthy smoke. OK at best
customer_reviews.author: Tapps

customer_reviews.title: weber quality?
customer_reviews.text: The purchase was great and the delivery on time I don't know how long this product is going to last after the first smoke it looks pretty rough will see it did Work for smoking a Boston butt and it turned out great
customer_reviews.author: Kwelch7

customer_reviews.title: Smokey goodness!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little time and a few trial and error uses to get it right but works great after that. Haven't experienced any of the warping described in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Stainless stays "clean" looking
customer_reviews.text: This box is easy to fill with damp chips, and small enough to share space in the grill. After use, it is of course discolored by heat and such, but it still looks fine, and doesn't need any washing.
customer_reviews.author: Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Lid buckled under heat.
customer_reviews.text: It was an effective smoke box, but when it gets hot the lid buckled and wouldn’t open fully. So you had to wait for it to cool before it would open so you could add wood chips. As a result you lost critical heat. I. Suggest having 2 boxes so you can just quickly swap them out.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: Works but better one might be available
customer_reviews.text: After using it once the box has become distorted from the heat and although still usable is bent up. Would probably advise that a heavier model would be better if using directly over the burner tubes.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Nice !
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker box if you don't want to burn the wood chips. Long lasting smoke.
customer_reviews.author: K . Stew

customer_reviews.title: Weber is the best
customer_reviews.text: High quality stainless steel. From a well respected company that makes makes the best Grills
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift, they loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this smoker box along with assorted wood chips. It was a gift, they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: krox722

customer_reviews.title: Good smoke box
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, cleaning is just a shake. Built well should last for years
customer_reviews.author: Ksmith

customer_reviews.title: It's a Perfect Weber Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I have used it about five times on a new Weber gas grill. They are a quality product and perfect for holding smoke chips. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Molon Labe 5.56

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and disburses quit a bit of smoke to fill grill
customer_reviews.author: Carl & Linda

customer_reviews.title: Let's lots of air in!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, but it lets a lot of air in which causes bigger fires.
customer_reviews.author: Austin K.

customer_reviews.title: happy and smoken
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Have used it multiple times without any problems. Heavy duty, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Lori J

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it it caught on fire, Then I learned how to really do it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing to compare it with, I use it for steaks to give at least some charcoal smell and it does quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Albi

customer_reviews.title: Where there's smoke there's "Flavor"
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to have some way to add some smoke flavor to food I prepare on my new NG grill. This little box does the job nicely (and neatly). Just follow the recommendations and you will enjoy the smoky goodness and the convenience of gas grilling
customer_reviews.author: BigBlock

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit Genesis II
customer_reviews.text: You'd think a Wber Smoker Box would fit a Weber Grill, but No!
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp edges, works great though.
customer_reviews.text: the smoker box works really well, but be careful the edges are super sharp. I sliced a huge gash in my pointer finger when I was washing it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew VanEenenaam

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but must keep recharging smoker box
customer_reviews.text: Never tried gas grill smoking before. Works great, but must keep recharging smoker box.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.  Bent on first use from heat
customer_reviews.text: The lid bent on first use from heat Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good size box for gas grills
customer_reviews.text: Was able to put a lot on wood chips in worked great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Soak the wood chips and then pour them in. In thirty minutes it will be smokin like crazy! We have the larger Weber Q electric grill and it works great. Gives the food an amazing smoke flavor. It smokes like crazy!!! Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: The best smoker help so far
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Might use smaller holes to reduce chance of flaming in the box. Needed to soak the wood first (short boil of the wood in the microwave). Box tolerated whet spray that I used to put out flaming. Pouting water on the box is to extreme - the surfaces begin to warp.
customer_reviews.author: CTI

customer_reviews.title: Worked great with my Weber Genesis
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with my Weber Genesis. Make sure you to soak your trips otherwise they will burn a lot faster. Smoker box gives plenty of smoke. I have used it under the grill, but it's definitely a balancing act on the Weber Genesis. Otherwise, I just put it on one side of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: MeeMoo

customer_reviews.title: I really Like this Product
customer_reviews.text: I really Like this Product, but it would be nice if the instructions came in English, because it is important to follow. This Product came with written in a Strange Language I couldn't read, but after time, I learned how to use it and like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Time Use
customer_reviews.text: This warped after one use and now the lid won’t shut.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Family

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my son in law for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son in law for Christmas. I know he uses wood when he grills and he is looking forward to using it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerdog

customer_reviews.title: No muss smoke!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever to add a touch of smoke while using a natural gas grill!
customer_reviews.author: Holly L. Blocker

customer_reviews.title: smoker box
customer_reviews.text: works well. Had to play with it but once I figured what I needed to do there were no problems.
customer_reviews.author: rtp320

customer_reviews.title: made the whole smoking process EASY! the easy open lid is great for adding ...
customer_reviews.text: used this for my thanksgiving turkey. made the whole smoking process EASY! the easy open lid is great for adding more chips without having to handle the smoker box. clean up is also very quick. thanks Weber for yet another great product. Your fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: This is the ticket for those that want to add ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the ticket for those that want to add authentic smoke flavour to foods when using a propane grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker box.
customer_reviews.text: I use wood pellets for smoking. The holes are a bit large so some of the pellets fall out. Easily fixed with some aluminum foil. Sits nicely off to the side of the grill. Hope the stainless steel lasts longer than the cast iron smokers I have used in the past that just rot and flake away.
customer_reviews.author: Astro

customer_reviews.title: Smoker Box
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Bought chips for it at the same time. Myhusband has been cooing ribs with it in BBQ. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pattengale

customer_reviews.title: Weber is quality
customer_reviews.text: husband uses it here and there when he wants to smoke on the gas grill. Since we have a charcoal grill too - we generally use that instead. as always - good product by weber. i would expect nothing less
customer_reviews.author: rach

customer_reviews.title: It's a fun grill item to start working with smoke
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun grill item to start working with smoke, but isn't always effective. When it is though, it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mario J. Suley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smoker box for my Weber Q 2200
customer_reviews.text: Good quality steel smoker box. After the smoker chips started to flame up, the box lid warped a tiny bit at one of the unhinged corner but otherwise still close and open without problems. I put this box on my Weber Q 2200 grill and a lot of smoke came out from the box and it's great. See the pictures. I used Kingsford premium blend mixed chips and the taste and smell of the steaks/shrimps/asparagus were great and have that off-the-grill taste.
customer_reviews.author: Totoro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A lot cheaper than buying a combo gas\wood grill.
customer_reviews.author: bdh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the Weber grill. Don't forget to buy the wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: Randyl B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality with good design
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this smoker for my husband, an avid griller. The quality of the box is excellent and my husband really appreciates that it has venting holes on both the top and bottom, allowing for improved smoking action from the wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but even if you soak the chips for hours they will eventually catch fire. Would recommend for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Not really a smoky flavor
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks too. If you want real smoke, get a smoker. Much different flavor
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M Toro

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses it’s become hard to open and close but otherwise works great
customer_reviews.author: Black5spdGT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Be sure to soak your chops in advance. I soak mine for a hour or longer.
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used it once, so not sure how long it will last with the extreme heat of the grill. I used the Weber apple wood chips and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Smoker box a great addition
customer_reviews.text: Smoked out first brisket on out weber NG grill and it was as good as any done on a wood or electric smoker
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Lid Warped After First Usage!
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cheap in quality. After one usage, the lid warped completely. I would have sent it back, but did not do so in time. Look for something sturdier!
customer_reviews.author: Isadora Pellman

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker Box
customer_reviews.text: I have smoked ribs and salmon using this smoker box on my grill. Functions as advertised. I have no experience with other smoker boxes, but I am very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Solis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and much faster than our charcoal smoker. So convenient since we can just use our regular gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As some reviewers observation the pieces of woods catch fire easily and when that happens the lid get bent and ...
customer_reviews.text: It did the job. As some reviewers observation the pieces of woods catch fire easily and when that happens the lid get bent and does not open. However, when cooled the lid opened with no problem. So I tried with a layer of aluminum foil on the bottom of the box, but it took long time to start the smoke... about 10 min... it seems right. It was a good tip. Well... it survived the fire, worked ok and it helped to add the smoke flavor to the final product. Next time I plan to try with the lid open.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Prime

customer_reviews.title: Works well but I burned it out
customer_reviews.text: This works better than any other box I have used for smoking on my Weber GG. Having said that, I am pretty hard on equipment and it is pretty burnt out after one season
customer_reviews.author: West Seattle Denizen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Smoker box warped after first use and now the lid is distorted.
customer_reviews.author: Amiri

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cheaper boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheap box from a local store, for about $6. It was definitely not as good. The Weber box has more holes, and is sturdier. We have used it with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Benasha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for the price. Read directions...must put it on high for 10-15 min to get it started...works great
customer_reviews.author: mark nicora

customer_reviews.title: Smoker box - great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the Grillart stainless smoker box! Sturdy and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. I use it on a gas BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I use it on a gas BBQ. Fill place on the cooking surface, easy and works great. Smoky!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Will

customer_reviews.title: For the hubby
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this smoker box for the grill. It was a surprise for him. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it is pictured and works great. This is very hard to find in stores here so I was glad to see it on Amazon. Will last a lot longer that the cast iron ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: The smoker box did the job; but it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The smoker box did the job; but it was the first time I used it, and the lid is already buckled up on one side from the heat. I used it at a temp of 200 degrees to 250. I preheated grill first so that should not have been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: linda morris

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive and it doesn't close right. Works ok but not up to Weber standards
customer_reviews.author: jzzbassman72

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought all this stuff and my husband loved it all.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: A new wrinkle for my Weber grilling. Smoking presents many options for grilling that I haven't done in the past. The box works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: OregonWill

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not rusting
customer_reviews.text: Works great, not rusting. Discolored w use as expected but no rust.
customer_reviews.author: TheUnscented

customer_reviews.title: Weber 7576 Universal Stainless Steel Smoker Box
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son. He has used it several times now and really likes it. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris Smith

customer_reviews.title: smoker box
customer_reviews.text: This box is working well for its use. Seems to be well made and is a good size.I thought it would be smaller
customer_reviews.author: vet clinic

customer_reviews.title: Ok to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Ok after a few grills it bent it is too thin. Lots of holes will burn your water soaked wood chip pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for my Grill
customer_reviews.text: Last minute by to add flava to my Summer grilling days. So far, so good. All who have shared in the this summers BBQ outings have stated that the smoker box added so much flavor, it made them want to 'slap' somebody.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Warped Smoker Box After Use
customer_reviews.text: My steel smoker box warped at the end of my use. The comments that J. Fox wrote is the EXACT same experience I had. Once again, I trusted the Weber name and it failed. I thought the smoker would operate better because it had holes on the bottom. This was not the case. In fact, the non-Weber smoker box I previously owned operated better than this one. This was a poor choice for my Weber gas grill. I'm going to repurchase the other smoker box I previously had with no bottom holes.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Chef

customer_reviews.title: i be SMOKIN '  !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: just what i wanted ...... simple ....... works great !!
customer_reviews.author: daniel k gersley

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job. Will take some trial and eror to figure out how much wood is needed for cooking various items. Quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Trotter Darco

customer_reviews.title: Stainless smoker box
customer_reviews.text: Replaced smaller wood chip box. This vents from top and bottom
customer_reviews.author: DJstocker

product_meta.title: Weber 7576 Universal Stainless Steel Smoker Box
product_meta.description: Color:SteelInfuse your grilled foods with delicious flavors of smoked wood chips. This Steel box can be placed under the grill grates to allow smoke to drift up, & the hinged lid with large tab allows you to easily add chips while in use. Fits Weber Q 200 series & larger gas grills.
feature_bullets: Easily add chips while in use
Out of Carton Dimensions: 9.7 x 4.7 x 2 inches
